title: Ground News - Former military man in the term, current mayor, about the Otopeni massacre. “We were told there were terrorists attacking the airport”
text:
Summary by Adevarul A former military veteran recalled, for “Adevărul”, the moments of horror lived 34 years ago, when his fellow unit members fired - on orders and being convinced that they were fighting against terrorists - on other young soldiers brought from Campina to defend Otopeni airport.
